description:
"1+1=2" is a slick calculator app with a ton of extras. There are now a ton of gorgeous skins to choose from with more on the way! There is a full size tape panel to keep track of your work as you go. It even has support for files so you can save your work and come back to it later.

I will be adding more advanced calculator modes, features, skins, etc. At $0.99 you can't go wrong with this app!
versionNote:
- added backspace button
- increased decimal precision to 21 places
- added user dismissable messages for rounded calculations and to introduce the backspace key
